TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_palidas, title = palidas, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/palidas} }

S.FORM: balidas (Hulam a sulit: ) alangawan nida sakauzip a mulangaway : madihinay nu kilang a walu a lasubu a lidek nu buyu'. saka cacay a sapihicahi:ca ( 1): kapah satangsuyan atu sasaasik atu sapacengceng sapibuting ku banuh. saka tusa a sapihicahi:ca ( 2): mangaduway a liuc sapisanga' tu saasik. saka tulu a sapihicahi:ca ( 3): asu' ka'nen tu dungec nu balidas.
